title: The Seventh Simian
description: When a young woman arrives in Autumn, without a name or any memory of her past, Edith takes her in knowing that the two of them are about to embark on a journey into the perilous realm of dreams. Sarah, the young woman, is pregnant and only Edithâ€™s skill and lore passed down from her grandmother can keep her safe from the hunters who stalk her, the child she bears and the seventh Simian to mankind.
author: Gary Kurylo
